View.Label: The coolest power of the snail is that it leaves something behind where-ever it goes.
Wouldn't it be awesome if you could do the same? If you could leave a memory of that very special moment on that exact spot?
Snailsnapp does just that. It is the new way to take, share and store your memories on the locations where they belong.
You will soon be able to start your personal snailtrail!
If you do snap a pic that is worth sharing to the world, do not hesitate!
One of Snailsnapp's coolest features is your ability to publicly share and explore spotlight news broadcasted on-site!
Why you want snailpower
\u2022 It will enable you to leave and find back your memories on a map
\u2022 By exploring publicly shared pictures you're able to get a view of what happened, when and where
Our mission
\u2022 Give snailpower to the world!
\u2022 Privacy first, nothing will ever be shared without permission
